Jean H. Matlock, Ward 1
=======================

903.306.8341

[Email Jean H. Matlock](mailto:jhmward1@att.net)

May 2015 – November 2027

[Map of Ward 1](https://texarkanatexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/9525/Ward-1-Map-Redistricting-2022)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dunbar High School (1965 – 1968)
Texas High School (1968 – 1971)
Texas A & M University-Texarkana, MBA
University of North Texas-Denton, BBA, Texarkana College-Texarkana, AA – Applied Science Data Processing

Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc. (Life Member)
Blacks in Government (Life Member)

Jean has one son, Christopher, and four granddaughters, JacQuise, Shontrice, Quaneidra and Britney. She is a member of Polly Chapel Missionary Baptist Church – Reginald Reid, Pastor.
